Depth-First.Explanation: Presents a specific hypothesis (Eduardo VII Park) and cites targeted location clues to support it
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesis: Eduardo VII Park; clues: Avenida da Liberdade, Marquês de Pombal roundabout, Avenida Sidónio Pais

Depth-First.Explanation: Reaffirms the park name hypothesis and plans a focused detail check of hedge design
Systematically observes and lists detailed visual and geographic cues to confirm Parque Eduardo VII
Depth-First.KeyElement: Geometric hedges, central statue, lamp posts, Cristo Rei in distance, Mediterranean trees

Depth-First.Explanation: Finalizes the precise location based on convergent analysis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Parque Eduardo VII, Avenidas Novas, Lisbon, Portugal
